Due to our use of multiple Landsat sensors (i.e. TM, ETM+, and OLI) within the NDVI trend map product, we calculated the sensor bias of NDVI at three different locations across Alaska, each containing a sample of 40,000 pixels
26 . We found minor calibration differences between sensors (i.e. one percent of the signal), while sensor specific NDVI distributions were consistent
26 .
